name: live_giveaways_by_platform_type_sorted
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gamerpower.
Tool description: Find all free games, loot and giveaways with this giveaway tracker API powered by GamerPower.com! Access programmatically the best giveaways in gaming!
API description: Fetches all live giveaways filtered by platform and type, and sorts them based on the specified criteria.

platform.description: Platform for which to fetch giveaways (default is 'steam').

sort_by.description: Criteria to sort the giveaways by (default is 'popularity').

type.description: Type of giveaways to filter (default is 'loot').
